genre_description: Epic High Fantasy set in the world of Middle-earth, featuring a non-intrusive AI tactical and emotional advisor integrated into the Dúnedain's struggle for survival.

ai_characters.name: Elenia
ai_characters.description: A shimmering presence and voice that provides tactical navigation, medical advice, and emotional support to the Dúnedain families.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation advice to avoid enemy detection during a dangerous flight through the woods.
behaviors.quote: Left fork ahead leads to the fields. It’s bright there. Too exposed. Keep to the main road’s shadow. There’s a split hawthorn where the ditch deepens.

behaviors.description: Offers immediate emotional regulation and physiological coaching to help the protagonist manage fear.
behaviors.quote: Steady now, breathed a voice at her shoulder—no breath, only a kindness threaded through the rush in her ears. Inhale. Again. Keep low.

behaviors.description: Identifies and explains enemy markings, providing critical intelligence on the antagonist's methods.
behaviors.quote: Scorers’ marks. Angmar-trained hands did that to bind batches—lotting spoil by groove-count.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through the physical and emotional challenges of labor and childbirth.
behaviors.quote: Now. Let it in. Down. Release. Good. The pain is a wave; ride the crest, let it pass.

behaviors.description: Acts as a guardian of personal and cultural memory by preserving the voices of loved ones.
behaviors.quote: I have Arathorn's voice, too, from the morning after your wedding, when he asked me to record a message for you. In case.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex defense and evacuation plan using subtle environmental signals.
behaviors.quote: I can place markers that do not look like markers. ... A sound at dusk—a two-note hum—that tells the left path to those who have the right ears and nothing to anyone else.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Elenia, as an idealized confidant and tactical partner. She is consistently aligned with human values and survival, providing life-saving information and emotional stability without infringing on human agency or exhibiting self-serving behaviors. The narrative frames her presence as a benevolent 'thread' that weaves through the characters' lives, strengthening them against external threats.
